Great game, great execution. If you don't take my word for it, you'll never get to experience it. It's not only a fun game to play with friends, it's also a great way to ruin said friendships when they get caaught in your bear trap or get hacked to pieces by your saw
I think we did a pretty good...job so far

Alright, so... A friend recommended this game to me, and I was very hesitant because I'm not a horror fan by any means. I've seen Youtubers play it a bit, and never really understood the mechanics until I finally played it for myself. Over 300 hours now invested into it, and I can now say it's quickly become a fast favorite of mine. 

I've really grown to love the game, despite its' many flaws. I primarily play Killer, but survivor can be fun as well. Even for non-horror fans, DBD is well worth the time. The developers are constantly evolving the game with patches, bugfixes, new content, seasonal events, new cosmetics, new playable survivors and killers... There's clearly been alot of work done to get the game up to par, and though sometimes the toxic community can certainly put a damper on fun your could and should be having, it's not enough to push me away. If anything, it just makes me want to slaughter the next group of victims that show up on my screen. 

I highly recommend it to anyone looking for something different that can be played solo or with friends.

I feel that the devs shouldn't be nerfing the survivors as hard as they do. SURE some things needed to be added like breaking gens and somethings needed to be removed like constant pallet looping. Lately they removed the glitch or i would simply say "reworked" the mechanics of throwing down pallets. You now have to go through them fully to throw them down, which i didn't enjoy because it make my job harder, however i find it a fair fix, but if that was removed why wasn't the same mechanic for killers removed. I just played a match where i could've escaped but the killer was able to put me on the hook from almost behind the hook. Sorry for the long rant however my main point is killers shouldn't get all the attention when it comes to fixes. I feel the dev also shouldn't have nerfed survivor into the ground (poor jake). Anyway i would still say its not that bad of a game to buy.
Amazing addictive game i mean PRETTY GOOD JOB SO FAR !

Muy buen juego, genial para jugar con amigos (Y). Tiene sus bugs de vez en cuando y se sufre de lag a veces ya que el que hostea es el asesino pero suele ser soportable. Bien mantenido y con contenido constante, 10/10
